item.title: Distribution: API Messages
item.description: <a href="/distribution/reservation-api/api-methods/messages/search/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-search"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Search</h3> <p>Search basic reservation information </p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/reservation-api/api-methods/messages/read/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-sticky-note"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Read</h3> <p>Read complete reservations information</p> </div> </div> </a>

item.title: Distribution: Code list
item.description: <a href="/distribution/reservation-api/api-methods/code-list/error-codes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list-ol"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Error Codes</h3> <p>List and description of error codes</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/reservation-api/api-methods/code-list/reservation-status-codes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list-ol"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Reservation Status Codes</h3> <p>List and description of reservation status codes</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/reservation-api/api-methods/code-list/data-type/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-bars"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Data Types</h3> <p>Data Types format in Reservation API</p> </div> </div> </a>
